QuestData.Title: WANTED: Orcs!
QuestData.Description: By order of Corporal Noreg Stormpike, all able bodied soldiers of Stormpike are required to slay any opposing orcs that they meet upon the field of battle.$B$BSoldiers are required to remove a tusk or tooth from the maw of the enemy and present said tooth as proof of their accomplishment.$B$BWear protective gloves.
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been tasked with slaying opposing Orc players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill an Orc and take their Orc Tooth back to Corporal Noreg Stormpike at Dun Baldar.
